response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere persönlichen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es wirklich keine gesetze, die uns vor dieser art von datendiebstahl schützen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? are there really no laws that protect us from this kind of data theft? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of personal information protection and data privacy. it questions the lack of effective laws and regulations to prevent companies from collecting and selling personal data without users' consent. the hashtags #datenschutz, #privatsphäre, and #sicherheit are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post with ongoing conversations about data privacy and security on twitter.
